name: I made a game in 2 hours and here it is
name_original: I made a game in 2 hours and here it is
description: So basically this is a shooter game with a gun mechanic in the similar to zombs-royale. all you got to do is use wasd to move and space to shoot, you also have to aim with the mouse. By killing robots and aliens you reach 30 points to fight the final boss. Try to have fun but you probably won't.
